item.title: A new blog for Camunda BPM posse
item.description:
I was delighted when Daniel asked me to valify (as Robert says) the Camunda BPM Team Blog and make it fit our CI (nope, for once, this ain’t meaning Continuous Integration). Here’s the little story about that work… erm… fun and some showoff about the new blog features.

Read more on http://localhost:1313/post/2015/10/camunda-posse-new-blog/
